mapper.insert: insert into media (title, description, company, genre, movie, opening_year, age_limit, media, poster_img, bg_img) values (#{title},#{description},#{company},#{genre},#{movie},#{openingYear},#{ageLimit},#{media},#{posterImg},#{bgImg})
mapper.select: select mno, poster_img from media where movie = true
select media from media where mno=#{mno}
select count(mno) from media where genre=#{genre} and movie = true
mapper.update: update media set read_count = read_count + #{cnt} where mno = #{mno}
